# rlevante

LEVANTE R package

## Installation

`devtools::install_git(url="https://github.com/levante-framework/rlevante")`

# Package index

## All functions

- [`get_corpus_items()`](https://levante-framework.github.io/rlevante/reference/get_corpus_items.md)
  : Get metadata for corpus items
- [`get_mapping_items()`](https://levante-framework.github.io/rlevante/reference/get_mapping_items.md)
  : Get metadata for mapping items
- [`get_participants()`](https://levante-framework.github.io/rlevante/reference/get_participants.md)
  : Get participants
- [`get_runs()`](https://levante-framework.github.io/rlevante/reference/get_runs.md)
  : Get run data
- [`get_scores()`](https://levante-framework.github.io/rlevante/reference/get_scores.md)
  : Get score data
- [`get_survey_items()`](https://levante-framework.github.io/rlevante/reference/get_survey_items.md)
  : Get metadata for survey items
- [`get_surveys()`](https://levante-framework.github.io/rlevante/reference/get_surveys.md)
  : Get survey data
- [`get_trial_items()`](https://levante-framework.github.io/rlevante/reference/get_trial_items.md)
  : Get metadata for trial items
- [`get_trials()`](https://levante-framework.github.io/rlevante/reference/get_trials.md)
  : Get trial data
- [`get_trials_prelim()`](https://levante-framework.github.io/rlevante/reference/get_trials_prelim.md)
  : Get trial data
- [`get_trials_raw()`](https://levante-framework.github.io/rlevante/reference/get_trials_raw.md)
  : Get raw trial data
- [`link_surveys()`](https://levante-framework.github.io/rlevante/reference/link_surveys.md)
  : Link survey data to participant data
- [`notebook_dataset()`](https://levante-framework.github.io/rlevante/reference/notebook_dataset.md)
  : Determine dataset of current notebook on Redivis
